title: Add Tamil language support and fix download functionality across all PDF tools

requirements.text: Add Tamil language as both source and target language option in the PDF translator language selection dropdowns

quotes: the translator also inclues tamil language

acceptanceCriteria: Tamil appears in both 'From' and 'To' language dropdown menus
Tamil language code is properly configured for the LibreTranslate API
Users can select Tamil as source language to translate from Tamil to other languages
Users can select Tamil as target language to translate other languages to Tamil

requirements.text: Fix the download functionality in the Image to PDF converter to properly generate and download the combined PDF file with all uploaded images

quotes: the download function is not working properly in all
Image to PDF converter has a broken download function

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the download button generates a valid PDF file containing all uploaded images
The PDF file downloads to the user's device without errors
Images are properly scaled and positioned on A4 pages in the generated PDF
The download includes all images in the order specified by the user

Downloaded files use appropriate naming conventions (e.g., page-1.png, page-2.png)
All image files are properly formatted and viewable after download

requirements.text: Verify and ensure the PDF Translator reliably extracts text from uploaded PDFs, translates all content using the LibreTranslate API, and generates a downloadable translated PDF with preserved formatting

quotes: the pdf translator is also not working properly

acceptanceCriteria: All text content is successfully extracted from uploaded PDF documents
Translation requests are sent to LibreTranslate API with proper error handling and fallback
Translated text is accurately placed back into the PDF maintaining original layout
Download generates a valid translated PDF with all pages and formatting preserved
Progress indicators show translation status during processing

constraints: Must use LibreTranslate API for translations as currently implemented
Must maintain the existing red-themed UI design
Frontend code must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
Do not modify immutable paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, and frontend/src/components/ui
All PDF processing must happen in the frontend using pdf-lib and PDF.js loaded from CDN
nonGoals: Adding new PDF tools or features beyond fixing existing functionality
Redesigning the UI or changing the red color theme
Adding additional translation services beyond LibreTranslate
Supporting additional document formats beyond those already implemented
